channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: Key Capitol Hill Hearings
channel.desc: Hearings, speeches and political coverage from around the United States.

channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: Discussion on Parental Rights & the Law
channel.desc: Rep. Virginia Foxx (R-NC) and other policy experts sit down for panel discussions on parental rights at an event hosted by the Cato Institute in Washington, DC.

channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: Discussion on Parental Rights in Schools
channel.desc: Rep. Virginia Foxx and other policy experts sit down for panel discussions on parental rights at an event hosted by the Cato Institute in Washington, DC.

channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: HHS Secretary Kennedy Testifies on 2026 Budget Request
channel.desc: Health and Human Services (HHS) Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. testifies on President Donald Trump's 2026 budget request for HHS before the Senate Appropriations Subcommittee on Labor, Health and Human Services, Education and Related Agencies.

channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: Discussion on Protecting Journalist in Conflict Zones
channel.desc: The Atlantic Council hosts a discussion with editors and journalists on how they balance safety and reporting from conflict zones.

channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: Live: Treasury Secy. Testifies on Department Priorities
channel.desc: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent testifies before the House Ways and Means Committee on his department's priorities.

channel.title: Key Capitol Hill Hearings

channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: Fmr. Nat'l Security Adviser Jake Sullivan on Foreign Policy Leadership
channel.desc: Former National Security Adviser Jake Sullivan participates in a discussion on foreign policy leadership abroad and in the U.S.

channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: Secretary of State Rubio Testifies on 2026 Budget Request
channel.desc: Secretary of State Marco Rubio testifies on President Donald Trump's 2026 budget request for the State Department before the Senate Foreign Relations Committee.

channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: Discussion on Regional Immigration Programs
channel.desc: The American Enterprise Institute hosts a discussion on regional immigration programs, which are initiatives intended to address immigration at the local level by focusing on economic needs.

channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: Sen. Eric Schmitt Speaks at Politico Security Summit
channel.desc: Lawmakers and national security strategists speak at a security summit hosted by Politico in Washington, D.C.

channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: Reps. McCaul & Krishnamoorthi Speak at Politico Security Summit
channel.desc: Lawmakers and national security strategists speak at a security summit hosted by Politico in Washington, D.C.

channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: British Ambassador to U.S. on Transatlantic Relations
channel.desc: Peter Mandelson, British ambassador to the U.S. and Labour Party politician, discusses U.S. and U.K. transatlantic relations at the Atlantic Council in Washington, D.C.

channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: Education Secretary Testifies on 2026 Budget
channel.desc: Education Secretary Linda McMahon testifies on President Donald Trump's 2026 budget request for her department before a House Appropriations subcommittee.

channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: Federal Reserve Board Chair Delivers Remarks on Economic Outlook
channel.desc: Federal Reserve Board Chair Jerome Powell delivers opening remarks at the board's International Finance Division's 75th Anniversary Conference in Washington, D.C.

channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: Discussion on the Importance of Borders
channel.desc: Conservative political commentator and author Victor Davis Hanson discusses the history of border security and its importance during an event hosted by the Heritage Foundation in Washington, D.C.

channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: Book TV
channel.desc: This long-running staple of the C-SPAN2 weekend schedule helps expand the channel's programming beyond politics. Most episodes of "Book TV" feature discussions with authors of nonfiction books, usually in the form of interviews, lectures or seminars. The series sometimes includes coverage of major book fairs and festivals. Some of the notable names who have appeared on the show include David Mamet and Tom Clancy.

channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: After Words
channel.desc: A guest host who shares an interest in the subject matter and a non-fiction author pair up to discuss the author's writings.

channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: Lectures in History
channel.desc: Classroom lectures on American history.

channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: American History TV
channel.desc: Airing weekends, "American History TV" offers programming about people and events that document the American story, geared toward history aficionados. Shows that air under the "American History TV" banner cover the history of the nation, from its founding in the 18th century through modern times. Topics covered include the Civil War, presidents and the exploration of historical sites.

channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: The Presidency
channel.desc: Historic speeches of former U.S. presidents as well as their policies and legacies.
